SELECT bus_line.*, bus_base_info.number, bus_base_info.plate_number, bus_base_info.plate_number_pic, bus_supplier.`name` AS bus_supplier_name, user_bus_mom.account AS bus_mom_account, user_bus_driver.account AS bus_driver_account, bus_base_info.school_partition, bus_base_info.ipad_meid FROM bus_line LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_line.bus_base_info = bus_base_info.id LEFT JOIN `user` AS u ON bus_base_info.bus_mom = u.id LEFT JOIN bus_supplier ON bus_supplier.id = bus_base_info.bus_supplier LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_mom ON user_bus_mom.id = bus_base_info.bus_mom LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_driver ON user_bus_driver.id = bus_base_info.bus_driver WHERE user_bus_mom.account = #{busMomAccount}
AND bus_line.`mode` = #{busMode}

SELECT bus_line.*, bus_base_info.number, bus_base_info.plate_number, bus_base_info.plate_number_pic, bus_supplier.`name` AS bus_supplier_name, user_bus_mom.account AS bus_mom_account, user_bus_driver.account AS bus_driver_account, bus_base_info.school_partition, bus_base_info.ipad_meid FROM bus_line LEFT JOIN bus_base_info ON bus_line.bus_base_info = bus_base_info.id LEFT JOIN `user` AS u ON bus_base_info.bus_mom = u.id LEFT JOIN bus_supplier ON bus_supplier.id = bus_base_info.bus_supplier LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_mom ON user_bus_mom.id = bus_base_info.bus_mom LEFT JOIN `user` AS user_bus_driver ON user_bus_driver.id = bus_base_info.bus_driver WHERE bus_base_info.school_partition = #{schoolPartition} -- todo

SELECT banji.class_name as banjiName, bbi.number as busNumber, bs_m.station_name as boardStationMorningName, bs_a.station_name as boardStationAfternoonName, student.*, bl.*, bbi.*
FROM student LEFT JOIN banji on banji.id = student.banji LEFT JOIN bus_stations as bs_m on bs_m.id = student.board_station_morning LEFT JOIN bus_stations as bs_a on bs_a.id = student.board_station_afternoon LEFT JOIN bus_line as bl on ( bl.id = student.bus_line_afternoon or bl.id = student.bus_line_morning) LEFT JOIN bus_base_info as bbi on bbi.id = bl.bus_base_info WHERE bbi.number = #{busNumber}
